name: D.C.A.
overview:
The small republic of Zandoli is attacked by the powerful dictatorship of General Sergel Jackmell. Young inexperienced cook, you are incorporated in a special unit in charge of the defense of the national territory.

You will have to protect the port of Tugais, the road of Foutoulèd, as well as the great desert of Mounklnlpwoblèm.
